answers.answer: I am 28 weeks. I have been feeling the same way. Do you have a way to weigh yourself? If you have gained more then four lbs in a week I would call your Dr. Excessive swelling is a symptom of preeclampsia. It wouldn't hurt to call your midwife though.

question: Hi ladies I'm 26 + 4 and the last couple of day I have not been feeling great today I'm really low and just wanna be in bed. Also my wrist fingers and ankles are swollen today and have had a headache all day :( I have got a gp appointment tommorow after noon what I'm really asking is should I call my midwife tonight or just go tommorow to check blood pressure?  Thanks
title: What to do
